name: Simple Cities
description:
If you want to play another one of my games, check out Fall of Bronze!

Welcome to Simple Cities!

Build one(or several) cities and name them how you want. Hire mayors to manage them for you, or build everything yourself.

The goal of the game is simple - get to 1 million total population(you can keep playing afterwards if you want). 

There are really two keys whose use is not explicitly stated in the game - CTRL - press it to pause the game!

I hope you enjoy!

This was made for the Weekly Game Jam 236 whose theme was "Cities".

Music by the Classified Composer.

If you enjoyed Simple Cities, consider supporting me on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/mysteriousdeveloper

Warning - this game contains randomly-generated city and people names. If an offensive word or the name of a person you might find offensive pops up, that was the result of random chance and random chance only!
